revised_title: An Experimental Inquiry into the Reproduction of Nerves
tldr: The author conducts a series of experiments on dogs to investigate the reproduction of nerves. He finds that the loss of the eighth pair of nerves leads to fatal consequences, regardless of whether the division is sudden or gradual. This study aims to determine the nature of the substance that unites the extremities of divided nerves and whether it possesses the characteristics of the original nerve.
